description: The world's largest pirate ship, originally an island from the West Blue that was converted into a massive vessel by Gecko Moria. It serves as the base of operations for the Thriller Bark Pirates and contains forests, a mansion, and an army of zombies.

keyEvents.title: Thriller Bark Revealed as a Ship
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hats discover that Thriller Bark is not an island but the world's largest pirate ship, originally an island from the West Blue.
keyEvents.significance: Major revelation that recontextualizes the entire setting and emphasizes Moria's power and ambition.

keyEvents.title: Night Hunt Begins on Thriller Bark
keyEvents.description: As midnight strikes, the Night Hunt officially begins with the Straw Hats entering the mansion while Moria's forces prepare to attack.
keyEvents.significance: Marks the beginning of the main conflict on Thriller Bark.

statusHistory.reason: Thriller Bark is operational and sailing through the Florian Triangle

description: A large gothic mansion in the center of Thriller Bark where Gecko Moria resides. It serves as the main headquarters for the Thriller Bark Pirates.

keyEvents.title: Straw Hats Enter the Mansion
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hat Pirates enter Thriller Bark's central mansion as the Night Hunt begins.
keyEvents.significance: The crew moves into the heart of enemy territory.

statusHistory.reason: Mansion is operational and serves as Moria's headquarters

name.japanese: ペローナのワンダーガーデン

description: A gothic-style garden on Thriller Bark filled with stuffed animals and Wild Zombies, serving as Perona's personal domain.

keyEvents.title: Perona Prepares in Her Garden
keyEvents.description: Perona gathers with her Wild Zombies including Kumashi and Hippo Gentleman in her wonder garden to prepare for the Night Attack.
keyEvents.significance: Shows Perona's domain and her forces preparing for battle.

statusHistory.reason: Garden is active and serves as Perona's base
